head.title: Mississauga Citizenship Lawyer - 24 Hour Emergency Contact - Canada Immigration Lawyers & Attorneys

img.alt: Leading Canadian and US Immigration Expertise - Since 1987

li.a: Federal Court and Immigration and Refugee Board Hearings

div.p: For individuals who find themselves in a situation where they need to speak to a lawyer urgently outside of regular business hours, our firm maintains a 24 Hour Emergency Line.
For non-urgent situations, please contact our head office at 416-862-0000 during regular business hours.
